author: Conor Gallagher
title: Virus of Covid-19 conspiracy theories spreads to Ireland
description: People urged to ignore misinformation linking coronavirus to 5G technology
content:
The Communications Regulator has urged people to ignore misinformation linking coronavirus to 5G mobile networks following a large increase in the spread of the conspiracy theory in Ireland.
Two mobile phone masts were set on fire in Letterkenny, Co Donegal,… [+3322 chars]
